title: Zombies: The Beginning (2007 Action film) Directed by Bruno Mattei

sources.title: Zombies: The Beginning (2007 Action film) Directed by Bruno Mattei
sources.description:
When the dead first walked, they had no time for appetizers.
A team of tough marines, led by Captain Jurgens, is sent to investigate a reported zombie outbreak on a remote Pacific island. Secret scientific experiments are being conducted there. Dr. Sharon Dimao, the only survivor of a previous zombie attack, joins the team on this dangerous rescue mission.

Original title: Zombi: La creazione (2007) 
Alternative titles: Zombies: The Beginning, Island of the Living Dead 2, Zombie: Začátek, 僵尸传奇, Зомби: Начало


Director: Bruno Mattei
Writers: Giovanni Paolucci, Antonio Tentori
Stars: Yvette Yzon, Alvin Anson, Paul Holmes
Genres:  Cult film, Action, Horror,
